content: *put three of my paid for patterns into your cart and get the cheapest one free * *a simple garter stitch triangle shawl pattern with yarn over increases to create shape this pattern would suit a confident beginner plus * **yarn used** sirdar country style 4ply 3x50gram balls shade 0540 **needle** uk3 75mm/us5 120cm circular **notions** tapestry needle 3 lockable markers **gauge** 20sts-36rows-10cms blocked garter stitch **finished measurements after blocking** wingspan-148cms width at widest point-130cms
